short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert GitHub repos and local directories into AI chat prompts. Select files, feed content to ChatGPT and Claude.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Repo lets you easily import GitHub repositories and local directories into AI chatbots like ChatGPT and Claude. This extension enhances your interaction with AI by providing relevant codebase context.

Key Features:

- Import GitHub repos or local directories into AI chat prompts
- Compatible with ChatGPT and Claude
- Select specific files or directories to include
- Generate a single, well-formatted text prompt from selected code

How It Works:

- Click the Prompt Repo button in the AI chat interface
- Enter a GitHub repository URL or choose a local directory
- Choose which files or directories to include
- The extension creates a formatted prompt with your selected code
